metadata.description: Guided workflow for deploying multi-tenant SaaS on the Platform4Sync standard stack

plugins.name: webplatform4sync
plugins.description: Platform4Sync skill surface for multi-tenant SaaS on Cloudflare + Neon. Choose your frame: Construction (site → pour → frame → wire → finish) or Shu-Ha-Ri (shu → ha → ri). Same tools, different approaches.

plugins.name: @syncupsuite/themes
plugins.description: Pre-built culturally-grounded design token packs. Import directly into Tailwind v4 or TypeScript — no build step required. Includes Swiss International and Nihon Traditional. DTCG-aligned, WCAG AA validated, zero runtime dependencies.
